H0.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Antelope

H1.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Deer

H2.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Cattle

H3.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Girafe

A4.text: The okapi and the giraffe are the only living members of the family Giraffidae.
